news.title: Turkey is preparing for a new operation against the Kurdistan Workers' Party in northern Iraq.

content.value: A New Chapter in Regional Politics
In December last year, Erdogan stated that the PKK threat would be eliminated by summer. After this, active preparations for the implementation of the plan began.
Turkish military preparations near the border.

On March 14, a meeting of the Turkish-Iraqi commission on joint efforts to eliminate Kurdish separatism and return territories under the control of the Iraqi government took place. More details can be found in the [full report](https://www.example.com).
This operation may lead to increased regional tensions.
Yesterday, information appeared that Kurdish units began to withdraw their detachments from the line of contact to the rear and mountainous areas in preparation for the Turkish offensive.
